https://tmrev.io/movie/460326-A Tale of Singers and Murderers 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sgVKj1YbYKazhL6rVgOhngCygMt.jpg The documentary depicts the remarkable phenomenon of the national competition Kalina Krasnaya, organised with a flourish in which the convicts from all over Russia sing their way to victory with songs about longing, war, love and forgiveness. A Tale of Singers and Murderers
